entry.title: YGG's Guild Protocol, Onchain Reputation, And The Next Wave Of Web3 Gaming With Gabby Dizon

YGG operates on the play-to-earn model, allowing players to generate income through in-game activities and ownership of digital assets.

entry.title: Self-Custodial Crypto Payments with Gnosis Pay: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Marcos Nunes is the Co-Founder of Gnosis Pay, a payment provider bridging the gap between self-custodial crypto wallets and traditional payment methods. Gnosis Pay recently launched a Visa card allowing users to spend their cryptocurrency through traditional payment rails without any fees. Marcos discusses the technology behind Gnosis Pay, the challenges of bridging crypto with mainstream finance, and the future of crypto payments. This interview was recorded during Money2020 in Amsterdam.
